price: moli onoga što će mu prije nauditi nego od koristi biti; takav je, doista, loš zaštitnik i zao drug!
arabic: يَدۡعُواْ لَمَن ضَرُّهُۥٓ أَقۡرَبُ مِن نَّفۡعِهِۦۚ لَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَوۡلَىٰ وَلَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡعَشِيرُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yadʿū laman ḍarruhu aqrabu min nafʿihi labi'sa al-mawlā walabi'sa al-ʿashīru
